arStrings.szText: This is the secret gathering place for the {c_highlight}Mercenaries of the Pale Hand{/c}. {icon:Quest_Priority_Available, 2.5}Explore the Hideout and reunite the Mercenaries.
As a Solo Player, you can {c_highlight}Hire{/c} Mercenaries to follow you into battle. Mercenaries go on standby when you join a party.
Enlist {c_highlight}Reinforcements{/c} to aid in critical situations. {c_highlight}Reinforcements{/c} stay enlisted even when you team up with other players.
